properties.areaDesc: Waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA extending from 20 nm to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 19 at 3:16PM EST until February 21 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 25 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 7 to 12 ft expected. For the Small
Craft Advisory, northeast winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to
30 kt and seas 5 to 8 ft.

* WHERE...Savannah to Altamaha Sound from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 5 PM Thursday to 10 PM EST
Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 5 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THURSDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 10 PM EST FRIDAY
